1: -module(xep_0352_csi_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile([export_all]).
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:     [{group, basic}].
    9: 
   10: groups() ->
   11:     [{basic,
   12:       [shuffle],
   13:       [server_announces_csi,
   14:        alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived,
   15:        alice_gets_msgs_after_activate,
   16:        bob_does_not_get_msgs_from_inactive_alice,
   17:        bob_gets_msgs_from_aclie_after_she_is_active_back,
   18:        bob_and_alice_get_msgs_from_each_other_after_alice_is_active
   19:       ]}].
   20: 
   21: suite() ->
   22:     escalus:suite().
   23: 
   24: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   25:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   26: 
   27: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   28:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   29: 
   30: init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   31:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   32: 
   33: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   34:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   35: 
   36: 
   37: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   38:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   39: 
   40: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   41:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   42: 
   43: server_announces_csi(_Config) ->
   44:     [{alice, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users([alice]),
   45:     Steps = [start_stream,
   46:              stream_features,
   47:              maybe_use_ssl,
   48:              maybe_use_compression,
   49:              authenticate,
   50:              bind,
   51:              session],
   52:     {ok, _Client, _Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
   53:     true = proplists:get_value(client_state_indication, Features).
   54: 
   55: alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived(Config) ->
   56:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   57:         given_client_is_inactive_and_message_sent(Alice, Bob),
   58: 
   59:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
   60:     end).
   61: 
   62: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config) ->
   63:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   64:         %%Given
   65:         given_client_is_inactive_and_message_sent(Alice, Bob),
   66: 
   67:         %%When client becomes active again
   68:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   69: 
   70:         then_client_receives_message(Alice)
   71:     end).
   72: 
   73: bob_does_not_get_msgs_from_inactive_alice(Config) ->
   74:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   75:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_message(Alice, Bob),
   76: 
   77:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
   78:     end).
   79: 
   80: bob_gets_msgs_from_aclie_after_she_is_active_back(Config) ->
   81:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   82:         given_client_is_inactive_and_message_sent(Alice, Bob),
   83: 
   84:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob">>)),
   85: 
   86:         %%When client becomes active again
   87:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   88: 
   89:         then_client_receives_message(Alice),
   90:         then_client_receives_message(Bob)
   91:     end).
   92: 
   93: bob_and_alice_get_msgs_from_each_other_after_alice_is_active(Config) ->
   94:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   95:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_message(Alice, Bob),
   96: 
   97:         %%When client becomes active again
   98:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   99: 
  100:         then_client_receives_message(Bob)
  101:     end).
  102: 
  103: 
  104: given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_message(Alice, Bob) ->
  105:     %%Given
  106:     given_client_is_inactive_and_message_sent(Alice, Bob),
  107: 
  108:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob">>)),
  109:     timer:sleep(1).
  110: 
  111: 
  112: then_client_receives_message(Alice) ->
  113:     Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  114:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, Msg).
  115: 
  116: given_client_is_inactive_and_message_sent(Alice, Bob) ->
  117:     %%Given
  118:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  119: 
  120:     %%When
  121:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice">>)),
  122:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)).
  123: 
  124: 
  125: given_client_is_inactive(Alice) ->
  126:     escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"inactive">>)).
  127: 
  128: 
  129: csi_stanza(Name) ->
  130:     #xmlel{name = Name,
  131:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:csi:0">>}]}.
  132:
